title: Hank Brown CU in D.C. Scholars Endowment Fund
description: To provide scholarship support (program fees, tuition, lodging, etc) for students enrolled in the CU in DC Internship Program in the College of Arts and Sciences.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support (program fees, tuition, lodging, etc) for students enrolled in the CU in DC Internship Program in the College of Arts and Sciences.
